title: Chat King
message: Sirgowi leads chatter with 274 messages, beating the rest.

title: Kill Beast
message: Loafy dominates with 15,996 boss kills, clan's fiercest slayer.

title: Quiet Titan
message: Theerecter boasts 230M XP yet only 20 messages—silent powerhouse.

title: Rapid Ascent
message: Sirgowi, 253 days in, amassed 4,102 kills and 274 messages.

title: Silent Veteran
message: Theerecter, 317 days old, only 20 messages—needs more banter.

title: Grind Guru
message: Loafy, 286 days here, 322M XP, 4 messages—true grindmaster.
